summary: This code defines a class `TOMVisionAlgView` in the file `TOMVisionAlgView.m`. It overrides three methods: `initView`, `refreshDisplay`, and `getNodeDesc`. The `initView` method sets the background color of the view to hex #AAAAAA, and the `refreshDisplay` method checks data, updates display content, and displays it in the header label. The `getNodeDesc` method returns a node description string.
